English: Yes, who is it?
Chinese: 來了，請問是哪位？
Korean: …네, 누구시죠?
German: Ja, wer ist da?

English:
Good afternoon. This is the Yamashina residence,
is it not?
Chinese:
你好，請問這裡是山科先生家，
沒有錯吧？
Korean:
안녕하세요, 야마시나 씨의 자택이
맞습니까?
German: Guten Tag. Sind wir hier richtig, bei Yamashina?

English: It is, but... who are you?
Chinese: 是沒錯……請問你們是？
Korean: 그런데요… 누구시죠?
German: Ja, aber ... Wer sind Sie denn?

English:
I'm actually looking for someone.
Excuse me, but might I inquire as to your name?
Chinese:
其實我們正在找人……
不好意思，可以請教你的大名嗎？
Korean:
아뇨, 사실, 사람을 찾고 있어서요
…실례합니다만, 당신의 이름을 여쭤 봐도 될까요?
German:
Ich suche jemanden.
Entschuldigen Sie, aber dürfte ich nach Ihrem
Namen fragen?

English: What? I'm Makoto Yamashina, but...
Chinese: 嗯……？　我叫「山科誠」……
Korean: …에? 전,「야마시나 마코토」라고 합니다만…
German: Wie? Ich bin Makoto Yamashina, aber ...

English: Thank you, Mr. Yamashina. One more question, sir.
Chinese: 那麼，山科誠先生，我想請教你一件事情。
Korean: 그럼, 야마시나 마코토 씨. 한 가지 여쭙겠습니다
German: Vielen Dank, Herr Yamashina. Nur eine Frage noch.

English:
I've heard someone in this area has gone missing.
Might you know who that could be?
Chinese:
這附近似乎有人失蹤……
你知道失蹤的是誰嗎？
Korean:
이 근처에서 행방불명자가 나왔다고 합니다만…
그 인물에 대해, 짐작 가는 바가 있으신지요?
German:
Ich habe gehört, dass jemand aus dieser Gegend
vermisst wird. Haben Sie eine Ahnung,
wer das sein könnte?

English:
A missing person?
No, I don't have the slightest idea.
Chinese:
失蹤的人？
沒有，我完全沒有頭緒……
Korean:
행방불명이 된 사람?
아뇨, 전 전혀 짐작 가는 게 없는데요…
German:
Jemand wird vermisst?
Nein, davon weiß ich gar nichts.

English:
I see.
Might I speak with your family about this as well?
Chinese:
是嗎……
我可以順便問問你的家人嗎？
Korean:
그런가요…
가족 분에게도, 여쭤 보고 싶습니다만
German:
Verstehe.
Dürfte ich Ihre Familie auch danach fragen?

English:
Unfortunately, my wife and daughter are out at
the moment.
Chinese: 不、不好意思……我太太和女兒都出門了……
Korean: 아, 공교롭게도… 아내도 딸도 외출 중이라서요…
German:
Meine Frau und Tochter sind leider gerade
unterwegs.

English: Where might your daughter be?
Chinese: 你女兒現在在哪裡？
Korean: 따님은, 지금 어디에?
German: Wo ist ihre Tochter denn?

English: Daddy, what's the matter?
Chinese: 爸爸，怎麼了？
Korean: 아빠, 무슨 일이야?
German: Papa, was ist denn los?

English:
Ah, you're home! Such good timing!
There's someone here who wants a word.
Chinese:
啊啊，回來了啊？正好……！
有人想跟妳說說話……
Korean:
아아, 돌아왔니. 마침 잘 됐구나…!
너와 얘기를 나누고 싶다는 분이 와 계셔서…
German:
Ach, du bist zurück! Genau rechtzeitig!
Da möchte dich jemand sprechen.

English: This is my daughter, Chika.
Chinese: 這是我女兒「千夏」。
Korean: 이쪽이 딸인,「치카」입니다
German: Das ist meine Tochter Chika.

English: Huh? What is this?
Chinese: 咦？有、有什麼事嗎……？
Korean: 에? 무, 무슨 일이죠…?
German: Hm? Was ist hier los?

English:
Hmm... This is your daughter, Mr. Yamashina?
You've no other children?
Chinese:
嗯，這位就是山科先生的女兒嗎？
請問你有其他子女嗎？
Korean:
흐음, 이쪽이 야마시나 씨의 따님, 인가요?
…그 외에, 자녀분은?
German:
Hm ... Das ist Ihre Tochter, Herr Yamashina?
Und sonst haben Sie keine Kinder?

English: No. Chika is an only child. Why do you ask?
Chinese: 沒有，只有千夏一個……為什麼要這麼問……？
Korean: 아뇨, 치카 하나 뿐입니다만… 왜 그런 걸…
German:
Nein. Chika ist Einzelkind.
Warum interessiert Sie das?

English: Just who are you, exactly?
Chinese: 你們兩個，到底是什麼人？
Korean: ……당신들, 대체 뭐예요?
German: Wer sind Sie überhaupt?

English:
They're asking after a missing person in the
area. Do you know of anyone missing?
Chinese:
因為這附近好像有人失蹤了，
妳知不知道？
Korean:
그게, 이 주변에서 행방불명이 된 사람이 있다는구나
너, 짐작 가는 게 있니?
German:
Die beiden fragen nach jemandem, der hier in der
Gegend vermisst wird. Kennst du jemanden?

English:
Missing?
Hmm. No, I haven't heard anything like that.
Chinese:
有人失蹤？
嗯……我不知道……沒聽說過。
Korean:
행방불명?
…아, 아니, 몰라… 들어 본 적 없어
German:
Vermisste?
Nein, davon habe ich nichts gehört.

English:
There you have it.
I'm sorry we weren't of much help.
Chinese:
就是這樣。
不好意思，幫不上你們的忙。
Korean:
…그렇다고 합니다
죄송하네요, 도움이 되질 못해서
German:
Sehen Sie. Tut mir leid, dass wir Ihnen nicht
weiterhelfen konnten.

English: Not at all. Thank you for your assistance.
Chinese: 不會，謝謝你們的協助。
Korean: 아뇨, 협력 감사합니다
German: Aber nicht doch. Vielen Dank für die Auskunft.

English: We were able to get the info we needed after all.
Chinese: 託你們的福，我已經得到了需要的資訊。
Korean: 덕분에, 필요한 정보를 얻을 수 있었습니다
German:
Wir haben alles Nötige in Erfahrung bringen
können.

English:
By the way, Mr. Yamashina, are you aware that
your EDEN account was hacked?
Chinese:
對了……山科先生，你有發現嗎？
你的EDEN帳號被盜取了。
Korean:
그런데… 야마시나 씨, 알고 계시는지요?
당신의 EDEN 계정은 누군가에게 강탈되어 있었습니다
German:
Herr Yamashina, wussten Sie, dass Ihr EDEN-Konto
gehackt wurde?

English: EDEN?
Chinese: EDEN……？
Korean: …………EDEN…?
German: EDEN?

English:
You can rest assured, however, that we have
restored the account. You can use it freely now.
Chinese:
不過請你放心，帳號已經取回來了，
繼續使用也不會有問題。
Korean:
하지만, 안심하세요. 이미 계정은 되찾았으니
사용하셔도 문제없습니다
German:
Wir haben das Konto bereits wiederhergestellt.
Sie können es jetzt wieder problemlos nutzen.

English: Is something wrong, Mr. Yamashina?
Chinese: 嗯？山科誠先生，怎麼了嗎？
Korean: 응? 야마시나 마코토 씨, 왜 그러시죠?
German: Stimmt etwas nicht, Herr Yamashina?

English: Please, just... please leave now!
Chinese: 請、請你們回去！
Korean: 도, 돌아가 주세요!!
German: Bitte ... Bitte gehen Sie jetzt einfach!

English:
It... It doesn't matter. Just leave!
We don't know anything about any missing person!
Chinese:
夠、夠了！快點回去！
我們不是說了不知道什麼失蹤人物嗎？
Korean:
돼, 됐으니까, 빨리 돌아가요!
행방불명자에 대해선 모른다고 했잖아요!?
German:
Das ... ist nicht wichtig. Gehen Sie!
Wir wissen nichts über irgendwelche Vermisste!

English: Let's go, Daddy!
Chinese: 走吧！爸爸！
Korean: 가자! 아빠!
German: Gehen wir, Papa!

English: Hmm. That was quite the brush-off.
Chinese: 嗯，我們被強行趕回了。
Korean: …흐음, 억지로 쫓겨나 버렸군
German: Hm. Die wollte uns wirklich loswerden.

English: And yet, we still got a lot of valuable info.
Chinese: 不過，也因此得到了相當重要的資訊。
Korean: 그만큼, 얻은 정보는 컸던 모양이다
German:
Und doch haben wir viele wertvolle Informationen
gewonnen.

English: This Chika is certainly Mr. Yamashina's daughter.
Chinese: 山科誠真正的女兒是山科千夏沒有錯。
Korean: 야마시나 마코토의 진짜 딸은, 야마시나 치카임이 틀림없어
German:
Diese Chika ist eindeutig Herrn Yamashinas
Tochter.

English:
Which means our client pretended to be Yamashina's
daughter for this case.
Chinese:
這麼一來，那位委託人，
就是假裝成山科誠的女兒前來委託的。
Korean:
그렇다고 한다면, 그 의뢰인은
야마시나 마코토의 딸을 사칭해서 의뢰를 하러 왔다, 라는 거다
German:
Unsere Klientin gibt also für diesen Fall vor,
Yamashinas Tochter zu sein.

English:
I'm not really interested in why she was deceiving
us on that front.
Chinese: 我對她假扮的理由沒有太大的興趣。
Korean: 사칭한 이유에 대해선, 그다지 흥미 없어
German:
Warum sie uns nun diesbezüglich täuscht,
ist mir eigentlich egal.

English:
But she wanted to find something out about him.
What's the connection between the two of them?
Chinese:
只是，委託人想探尋山科誠的什麼……？
這背後到底有什麼……？
Korean:
하지만, 의뢰인이 야마시나 마코토에 대한 무엇을 알고 싶었는지…
그리고 배후 관계에, 무엇이 있는지…
German:
Aber sie wollte etwas über ihn herausfinden.
Wie hängen die beiden zusammen?

English: That's what really piques my interest.
Chinese: 相當耐人尋味。
Korean: 매우 흥미를 돋우는 점들이지
German: Das wüsste ich wirklich zu gern.

English: There's one more thing I'm concerned about.
Chinese: 我還有一件很在意的事……
Korean: 그리고, 신경 쓰이는 점이 하나 더…
German: Eine Sache beschäftigt mich außerdem noch.

English: But let's leave that for now.
Chinese: 算了，先放一邊吧。
Korean: …뭐, 이건 제쳐 두도록 하지
German: Aber vergessen wir die vorerst.

English:
The client said she'd come back to the agency.
Let's have ourselves some coffee and wait for her!
Chinese:
委託人說會再來事務所，
我們就一邊喝咖啡，一邊愉快地等待她大駕光臨吧！
Korean:
의뢰인은, 다시 사무소에 방문하겠다고 했다
의뢰인의 도착을 기대하면서 커피라도 마시면서 기다리자고
German:
Die Klientin meinte, sie würde zum Büro
zurückkehren. Holen wir uns einen Kaffee und
warten wir auf sie!

English: Come on, let's head back to the agency.
Chinese: 走吧，回事務所去。
Korean: 자, 사무소로 돌아가지
German: Komm schon, gehen wir zurück ins Büro.
